trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object that specifies the connection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> que especifica a conexão.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> object that specifies the server certificate.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate" /> que especifica o certificado do servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> delegate gets or sets the default callback function used to verify server certificates when establishing an SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: O delegado <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyServerCertificateCallback" /> obtém ou define a função de retorno de chamada padrão usada para verificar os certificados do servidor ao estabelecer uma conexão SSL.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client approves the server certificate; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o cliente aprovar o certificado do servidor; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
